result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: All records scanned and verified.

Defendant in custody.
The State moves to dimiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to charges in 15 CF 271, 16 CF 45, 14 CF 442, 15 CF 444, 15 CF 480 and 15 CF 608.  Motion granted.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Status conference is set for 02-18-16 at 2:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
This case is riding along with 15 CF 608, 15 CF 603 and 16 CF 435 which is set for a preliminary hearing is set for 02-01-16 at 10:30 a.m.
Minutes.
Status conference at 01-25-2016 02:30 pm

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua J. REED
Current: 1207 Marshall St, #1, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 01-11-2016)
Prior: 1669 Atlanta Circle, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States
Condition: Defendant must report daily to the MTPD by 5:00 p.m.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for a Status Conference on 01-25-2016 at 2:30 p.m., Br. 1.  $1,500.00 recognizance bond previously furnished is continued by the Court with the added condition that he report daily to the Manitowoc City Police Department by 5:00 p.m.  Amended Bail Bond furnished.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Defendant failed to appear for status conference.   Bench warrant authorized.

Motion to Modify Bond.
Cover letter.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 09-28-15 at 4:00 p.m.
MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defense requests that the no contact condition with Danielle Koch be lifted.  State objects.
Court would extend a motion to allow contact strictly for doctor's appointments or counseling at a later date, but denies the motion at this time.
State to draft order.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-20-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond withthe condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours.   
Minutes.
Marcus Falk, through public defender.

RE:  Bail jumping, on 07-13-15.
Initial appearance is set for 07-27-15 at 2:30 p.m.
